description: This file provides seed/mock content and functions for accessing blog posts in a React project. It includes functions for retrieving all posts, finding a post by slug, and searching posts with filtering logic, along with a sample data array of posts.

methods.name: getAllPosts
methods.description: Returns all posts sorted by date (newest first).

methods.name: getPostBySlug
methods.description: Finds a post by its slug.

methods.name: searchPosts
methods.description: Filters posts by title, excerpt, or tags based on a query string.
